name: Debugger (TomatoOmelet)
description:
Submission for Game Off 2021 Game Jam.

You are an automatic debugger who needs to fix all the bugs in the game world since game developers are too lazy to do that themselves. Bugs are objects that look weird and should not exist in the game. Fixing all the bugs to make the game clean and not terrible.

The game is made with Unity.

Background musics and sound effects are from the following Unity Assets:

  • Ultimate Game Music Collection
  • Ultimate SFX Bundle - HD Remaster
  • Universal Sound FX
  • Interface and Item Sounds

Thank you for playing this terrible game!
